ItemNamesRequestPacket Class Reference

Send the ID of some items that are located on the same map to the map module to get their names. More...

Detailed Description

Send the ID of some items that are located on the same map to the map module to get their names.

Create a new item-names request packet.

Parameters:

Add one item to this packet.

uint32 ItemNamesRequestPacket::getItem (  uint32  i  )  const
 

Get one of the items in this packet.

Parameters:
i The index of the item to return. Valid values are 0 <= i < getNbrItems().
Returns:
The ID of item number i. MAX_UINt32 will be returned upon error.
